SEA Games 2019: Ketua PSSI dan Menpora akan Kunjungi Timnas
04 Nov 2019, 10:17 by Irsyan Hasyim (Kontributor), Hari Prasetyo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta- Ketua Umum PSSI 2019-2023, Mochamad Iriawan alias Iwan Bule, mengatakan telah mengajak Menteri Pemuda dan Olahraga Zainudin Amali untuk melihat persiapan Tim Nasional atau Timnas U-23 yang bakal berangkat ke SEA Games 2019.
Latihan tim besutan Indra Sjafri itu bakal digelar di Lapangan ABC Geloa Bung Karno Senayan. "Pak Menteri bakal mengunjungi tempat latihan mereka tanggal 8 November," kata Iwan Bule di Kantor Kemenpora, Senin, 4 November 2019.
Mantan Kapolda Metro Jaya ini mengatakan telah mendapatkan laporan dari Indra Sjafri perihal kondisi tim Garuda Nusantara. Seluruh pemain dalam kondisi yang prima. "Hanya ada satu-dua pemain dari klub yang belum dikirim ke tim untuk bisa bergabung bersama-sama," kata Sekretaris Utama Lemhanas ini.
Sebelumnya, Iwan Bule tiba di Kantor Kementerian Pemuda dan Olahraga sekitar pukul 13.56 WIB. Mantan Kapolda Metro Jaya ini datang didampingi salah satu Wakil Ketua Umum yakni Cucu Sumantri. Keduanya langsung menuju ke Lantai 10 Gedung Kemenpora yang merupakan ruangan Menteri Pemuda dan Olahraga Zainudin Amali. Iwan Bule tampak memakai seragam polisi dan Cucu Sumantri mengenakan seragam TNI Angkatan Darat.
Sepuluh menit sebelum, Sekretaris Jenderal PSSI Ratu Tisha lebih dulu menyambangi Kantor Kemenpora. Satu wakil ketua PSSI lainnya, Iwan Budianto tidak hadir karena lagi berada di Malang, Jawa Timur.
Dua hari setelah resmi menjadi nakhoda PSSI, mantan Kapolda Metro Jaya ini mulai melakukan kerjanya dengan membangun sinergi dengan pemerintah. Salah satu agenda dengan bertemu dengan Menteri Pemuda dan Olahraga Zainudin Amali pada Senin, 4 November 2019. "Pertemuan bakal berlangsung pada pukul 14.00 di Kantor Kemenpora," kata Sekretaris Kemenpora, Gatot S Dewa Broto melalui keterangan tertulis, Senin, 4 November 2019.
Setelah resmi menjadi Ketua Umum PSSI, Iwan Bule berjanji membentuk tim kelompok kerja (pokja) untuk menjalankan Instruksi Presiden (Inpres) Nomor 3 Tahun 2019 tentang Percepatan Persepakbolaan Nasional.
Menurut Iwan Bule, yang terpilih sebagai ketua umum PSSI 2019-2023 dalam KLB, pokja tersebut akan berkoordinasi dengan kementerian dan lembaga yang tercantum dalam Inpres yang ditandatangani Presiden Joko Widodo pada 25 Januari 2019 itu.
Pria berusia 57 tahun tersebut ingin Inpres tersebut segera terwujud dalam tindakan nyata demi mendongkrak prestasi sepak bola nasional. "PSSI harus menjemput bola. Inpres itu sejak dikeluarkan sampai sekarang belum berjalan. Jadi harus asa percepatan," tutur Iwan.

SEA Games 2019: PSSI Chair and Menpora will Visit the National Team
Nov 04 2019, 10:17 by Irsyan Hasyim (Contributor), Hari Prasetyo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta- General Chairperson of PSSI 2019-2023, Mochamad Iriawan alias Iwan Bule, said that he had invited the Minister of Youth and Sports Zainudin Amali to see the preparations for the U-23 National Team or National Team who would depart for the 2019 SEA Games.
The training by Indra Sjafri's team will be held at the Geloa Bung Karno Senayan ABC Field. "The Minister will visit their training site on November 8," Iwan Bule said at the Kemenpora Office, Monday, November 4, 2019.
The former Metro Jaya Police Chief said that he had received a report from Indra Sjafri regarding the condition of the Garuda Nusantara team. All players are in top form. "There are only one or two players from the club who have not been sent to the team to be able to join together," said Lemhanas's Chief Secretary.
Previously, Iwan Bule arrived at the Office of the Ministry of Youth and Sports around 13.56 WIB. The former Metro Jaya Police Chief came accompanied by one of the Deputy Chairpersons namely Cucu Sumantri. Both of them went straight to the 10th Floor of the Ministry of Youth and Sports Building which is the Minister of Youth and Sports Zainudin Amali's room. Iwan Bule was seen wearing a police uniform and Cucu Sumantri was wearing an Army uniform.
Ten minutes before, PSSI Secretary General Ratu Tisha visited the Kemenpora Office first. One other vice chairman of PSSI, Iwan Budianto was not present because he was again in Malang, East Java.
Two days after officially becoming the captain of PSSI, this former Metro Jaya Police Chief began to do his work by building synergy with the government. One of the agendas was to meet with the Minister of Youth and Sports Zainudin Amali on Monday, November 4, 2019. "The meeting will take place at 14.00 at the Ministry of Youth and Sports," said the Ministry of Youth and Sports, Gatot S Dewa Broto through written statements, Monday, November 4, 2019.
After officially becoming the General Chair of PSSI, Iwan Bule promised to form a working group team (pokja) to carry out Presidential Instruction (Inpres) No. 3 of 2019 concerning the Acceleration of National Football.
According to Iwan Bule, who was elected as chairman of PSSI 2019-2023 in the KLB, the working group will coordinate with the ministries and institutions listed in the Presidential Instruction signed by President Joko Widodo on January 25, 2019.
The 57-year-old man wants the Inpres to be immediately manifested in concrete actions to boost national football achievements. "PSSI has to pick up the ball. Since the Presidential Instruction was issued until now it has not yet run. So we have to expect an acceleration," said Iwan.
